# AVAudioSessionRouteDescription

**Class**

An object that describes the input and output ports associated with a session’s audio route.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAudioSessionRouteDescription
```

## Overview

You don’t create instances of this class yourself. Instead, you retrieve the current audio route from your app’s [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession] object.

## Getting the Input and Output Ports

- **inputs**: An array of audio input port descriptions.
- **outputs**: An array of audio output port descriptions.

## Inspecting the current route

- **currentRoute**: A description of the current audio route’s input and output ports.
- **AVAudioSessionPortDescription**: Information about the capabilities of the port and the hardware channels it supports.
- **routeChangeNotification**: A notification the system posts when its audio route changes.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
